thread.title_full: A great find - Review of Vieux Marais, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Smiggy64
title: A great find
text: Situated in the Marais area, the hotel is in a great position for bars, cafes, restaurants, shopping and within walking distance of Parisian landmarks. Including the Pompidou, the Seine and Notra Dame. But there are many more. The staff are all very welcoming and chatty. The reception area is very well decorated and has a seating area. Lifts to all floors. We had a choice of room and went for one with a wet room. Rooms are basic with ensuite, plenty of hanging space and t.v. Drawbacks, no safe I room, no tea/coffee and can get noisy as doors have to be pulled closed. Our room had no view but do not know what kind of view you'd get in a small street. If your on a budget, it's worth a try.
